Congratulations to Algerian Minister of Foreign Affairs 
    Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Mohamad Bjaoui upon his appointment as Minister of State and Foreign Minister of Algeria.
 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in carrying out his new duty.

articles.title: Resources of Koryo Medicines Increase
articles.content:
Baby Milk Produced by New Method
    Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is turning out baby powdered milk by a new method.
 The main ingredient of the milk for babies under the age of two is maltodextrin made by starch liquefaction ferment.
 The new production method has been developed by technicians of the factory and scientists of the Grain Processing Institute under the Branch Academy of Light Industry Science.    
 They have found out a highly active bacterial strain producing liquefaction ferment and raised its activation 10 times that of existing one. They also
have established a process for producing such strain of bacteria.    
 The liquefaction ferment, which was introduced instead of malt, makes maltodextrin a chief component of the saccharified liquid. It prevents powder from adhering to desiccator.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
    Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greetings to President of the Democratic Republic of Congo Joseph Kabila on the occasion of the 8th anniversary of the liberation of the country.
 He in the message sincerely wished the president and the people of Congo greater successes in their work to defend the peace and sovereignty of the country, expressing the conviction that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would further develop.

articles.content:
Greetings to King of Norway
    Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Norwegian King Harald V on the occasion of the national day.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the king and took this opportunity to wish him good health and happiness as well as the people of Norway prosperity.
